00002  * @file server.c

00007 #include "server.h"

00009 /**
00010  * Erlang Server Thread
00011  *
00012  * Handles requests coming from an Erlang client
00013  *
00014  */
00015 void *server_thread(void *params) {
00016         int listen_socket = 0;
00017 
00018         server_params *parameters = (server_params *) params;
00019 
00020         doLogInteger(LOG_DEBUG,"Server Thread Started, port[%u]", parameters->port);
00021 
00022         // open server socket
00023         listen_socket = server_open_port( parameters->port );
00024         if (listen_socket <= 0) {
00025                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot open server socket");
00026                 return NULL;
00027         }
00028 
00029         // connect to the Erlang subsystem
00030         ei_cnode node;
00031 
00032         if (ei_connect_init(&node, "phidget_manager", parameters->cookie, 0) < 0) {
00033                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot connect to the Erlang subsystem");
00034                 return NULL;
00035         }
00036 
00037         // publish our server port through Erlang EPMD
00038         if (ei_publish(&node, parameters->port) == -1) {
00039                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot publish server port with Erlang EPMD");
00040                 return NULL;
00041         }
00042 
00043         //if ((fd = erl_accept(listen, &conn)) == ERL_ERROR) {
00044         //      doLog(LOG_ERR, "cannot publish server port with Erlang EPMD");
00045         //      return 1;
00046         //}
00047 
00048 
00049         PhidgetManagerMessage *msg;
00050 
00051         //main loop
00052         while(1) {
00053                 sleep(5);
00054                 msg = (PhidgetManagerMessage *) qport_receive(parameters->qpc);
00055                 if (msg!=NULL) {
00056                         doLog(LOG_DEBUG, "got message");
00057                         manager_destroy_message(msg);
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063         return 0;
00064 }// server_thread
00065 
00066 
00067 /**
00068  * Opens the local socket port
00069  */
00070 int server_open_port(int port) {
00071 
00072   int listen_fd;
00073   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00074   int on = 1;
00075 
00076   if ((listen_fd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) < 0)
00077     return (-1);
00078 
00079   setsockopt(listen_fd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &on, sizeof(on));
00080 
00081   memset((void*) &addr, 0, (size_t) sizeof(addr));
00082   addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00083   addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00084   addr.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00085 
00086   if (bind(listen_fd, (struct sockaddr*) &addr, sizeof(addr)) < 0)
00087     return (-1);
00088 
00089   listen(listen_fd, 5);
00090 
00091   return listen_fd;
00092 }//[/open_port]
